description: The blademaster always hits the weakest spot.
The sky belongs to Mira, and she will let nobody else take it.
Therodin is always on the hunt for his next artefact, finding precious stuff where others find only trash.
Amelia possesses a mysterious healing power that she acquired at the age of three. Her mother is a powerful Arch Sorceress.
Grolk senses hidden creatures and grants this talent to his followers.
